class st.matter.clusters.BooleanState.StateValue
ID: number

0x0000 the ID of this attribute

NAME: str

“StateValue” the name of this attribute

data_type: st.matter.data_types.Boolean

the data type of this attribute

new_value(...)

This is also usable with the StateValue(…) syntax
